title: Teenage girl
creator_credit: Sam Napier-Bell, Leon Clore, Basic Films and British Information Services
brief_description: A sixteen-year-old girl’s interests and successive choices of careers are shown humorously. Indicates the opportunities waiting for school-leavers of both sexes.
creator_credit_for_label: Sam Napier-Bell, Leon Clore, Basic Films and British Information Services
